about_the_game:
■ About the Game

GuiGui is a clicker game where you click on a cute character named GuiGui!
Get a random character item from the GuiGui universe every 3 hours and grow your collection, featuring exclusive art pieces by GuiGui himself!

■ Features:
- GuiGui, of course
- Items to grow your collection
- Achievements
- A community that's as cute as GuiGui
- Exclusive designs by GuiGui: All items received every 3 hours are original creations by the artist GuiGui

■ About the artist GuiGui (귀귀)

GuiGui(귀귀) is a celebrated Korean webtoon artist and oil painter, known for his unique artistic style and engaging storytelling. Fans who recognize his talent often describe GuiGui as either a genius or a madman. GuiGui gained popularity through major Korean webtoon platforms such as Naver Webtoon, where he serialized famous works like 'Passionate Man' and 'Hot-Blooded Elementary School.' His artistic endeavors have expanded to include canvas oil paintings.

Since his first exhibition in 2022, GuiGui has held several creative exhibitions combining webtoon elements with symbolic oil paintings. His oil paintings and illustrated prints are particularly known for being traded at high prices.

Through this game, we aim to introduce GuiGui's artistic world to a global audience, allowing players to enjoy and appreciate his original creations.

For more information about GuiGui, visit his Wikipedia page.

highlighted.name: I don't need things like luck.

content_descriptors.notes:
Some of the characters that appear in the game may have body exposure or sexual depictions.
Also, some cartoon violence may be seen.

short_description: GuiGui is a clicker game where you click on a cute character named GuiGui! Every 3 hours, you get a random character item from the GuiGui universe. Each item is an original creation by the renowned Korean webtoon artist and oil painter, GuiGui(귀귀). Join us and be part of something fantastic!

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Greek*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Danish*, Russian*, Romanian*, Vietnamese*, Bulgarian*, Swedish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Arabic*, Ukrainian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Czech*, Thai*, Turkish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Polish*, Finnish*, Korean*, Hungarian*, Galician*, Gujarati*, K'iche'*, Nepali*, Dari*, Latvian*, Luxembourgish*, Lithuanian*, Marathi*, Maori*, Macedonian*, Malayalam*, Malay*, Maltese*, Mongolian*, Basque*, Valencian*, Bangla*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Serbian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Scots*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Icelandic*, Irish*, Azerbaijani*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Estonian*, Odia*, Yoruba*, Urdu*, Uzbek*, Welsh*, Uyghur*, Wolof*, Igbo*, Georgian*, Zulu*, Cherokee*, Tswana*, Kazakh*, Catalan*, Kannada*, Quechua*, Xhosa*, Konkani*, Croatian*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Kyrgyz*, Tamil*, Tajik*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Turkmen*, Tigrinya*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*
